text: Ngakho-ke banqoba ngentando kaMvelinqangi futhi uDavide wabulala uGoliyathi futhi uMvelinqangi wamnika ubukhosi nokuhlakanipha wamfundisa kulokho ayekufisa. Futhi ukube kwakungesikona ukuthi uMvelinqangi ugudluza abanye abantu ngabanye, umhlaba wawuzokonakala kodwa uMvelinqangi ungonobubele emihlabeni
